thread.title: MEDIA-Former Portsmouth FC owner detained in Russia for suspected fraud - RBC

title: MEDIA-Former Portsmouth FC owner detained in Russia for suspected fraud - RBC
text:
April 12, 2018 / 7:34 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago MEDIA-Former Portsmouth FC owner detained in Russia for suspected fraud - RBC Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 12 (Reuters) - Vladimir Antonov, a Russian banker and former owner of English football club Portsmouth, has been detained by police in Russia on suspicion of fraud, Russiaâ€™s RBC online news portal reported late on Wednesday, citing unnamed police sources. 
* A police source said Antonov is suspected of embezzling funds from Sovetsky bank, RBC reported. 
* The report said that Sovetsky bank was not officially owned by Antonov. -- Source link: here -- Note: Reuters has not verified this story and does not vouch for its accuracy. (Reporting by Moscow newsroom)
